name: ApplicationVersion
shortDesc: Creates an application version, an iteration of deployable code, for an Elastic Beanstalk application.

properties.name: ApplicationName
properties.desc: Name of the Elastic Beanstalk application that is associated with this application version.

properties.name: Description
properties.desc: A description of this application version.

properties.name: SourceBundle
properties.desc: The location of the source bundle for this version.
